rooms.description: Wide entrance with a wheelchair-accessible path, includes a Vastu-compliant space for receiving guests.
Spacious living area designed to maximize natural light through strategically placed openings; Kerala style with traditional motifs.
Adjacent dining space allowing natural ventilation and daylight; incorporates local materials for aesthetics.
Well-equipped kitchen with a view to the courtyard, ensuring cross ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.
Master bedroom located in a quiet corner for privacy and optimal natural light exposure.
Additional bedroom designed with accessibility features including wider doorways.
Third bedroom ensuring a balanced layout in line with traditional Kerala Nalukettu design.
Wheelchair-accessible bathroom with proper ventilation and easy access from the living area.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible main door with natural light considerations.
Large windows to enhance natural ventilation and daylight in the living area.
Window placements adhering to Vastu principles for optimal light exposure.
Cross ventilation windows in the kitchen as per local building norms.
